metadata.title: CVE-2020-25724 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in RESTEasy, where an incorrect response to an HTTPrequest is provided. This flaw allows an attacker to gain access toprivileged information. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality and integrity. Versions before resteasy 2.0.0.Alpha3 areaffected.

criterions.comment: resteasy3.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
